topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries

name: libwebplot
short_description: libwebplot is a C library for dynamically generating plots in a CGI environment. The currently available plot types are: scatter plots, histograms, and heat plots. The library will generate png or jpeg (using gd) with imagemaps (i.e. a clickable plot).
